tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE credit_card_info (
    card_number VARCHAR(16),
    card_holder VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    cvv VARCHAR(3)
)

CREATE TABLE credit_cards (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number BYTEA,
    cardholder_name VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    cvv BYTEA,
    encrypted_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    card_id UUID,
    amount FLOAT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (card_id) REFERENCES credit_cards(id)
);

CREATE TABLE credit_cards (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL,
    cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    encrypted_data TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    card_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES credit_cards(id),
    customer_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES customers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  credit_card_number VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  credit_card_expiry DATE,
  credit_card_cvv VARCHAR(4) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(id),
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE encryption_keys (
  customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(id),
  encryption_key VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  action VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE CreditCardInfo (
    credit_card_number INT,
    cardholder_name VARCHAR(255),
    expiration_date DATE,
    security_code VARCHAR(5)
)

CREATE TABLE Customer (
    customer_id INT,
    first_name VARCHAR(255),
    last_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Transaction (
    transaction_id INT,
    credit_card_number INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE EncryptionKey (
    key_id INT,
    encryption_alg VARCHAR(50),
    encryption_key BINARY(64)
)

CREATE TABLE User (
    user_id INT,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    password_hash BINARY(64),
    is_admin BOOL
)
